inn1.comm: good length first up, but a tad too straight, and de Villiers clips it around the corner for one, South Africa are on the board
thats a bad one, very wide of off stump and Smith leaves it alone
fuller length delivery on middle and leg, Smith shuffles across and turns it to leg for a quick single to get off the mark
good length delivery outside off stump, de Villiers lets it go
fullish delivery on middle and leg, seaming away, de Villiers shuffles across and looks to flick it away, gets rapped but its too high, reckons the umpire
good length delivery outside off stump, de Villiers lifts his bat and lets it go
short of a length outside off stump, de Villiers goes back and crunches that square of the wicket for four
bad ball, overpitched, and Smith drives that nicely through the gap on the off side
this one's not as full but still there's width to drive, and Smith comes forward and drives that on the up through covers for four more, top shot
short of a good length delivery outside off stump, Smith opens the face of the bat and steers it down to third man
full down the legs, de Villiers tooks to clip it its wide anyway
again this one's down the leg side and called wide, Rana struggling today
three in a row! This one's pitched well outside the off stump and swinging away, and the umpire spreads the arms
back of a good length outside off stump, he gets behind the line and defends
back of a length but straighter, he gets behind it and pushes to mid-on, but Rana moves across and fields, and they stay put
this one's on a good length and de Villiers comes forward and defends to the offside...a lot of extra balls in that over
good length around off stump, accurate stuff, Smith comes well forward and defends back to Asif
back of a length just outside off stump, no room on offer, Smith hurries to get the bat down on it
this one's fullish, starting on middle and leg and then moving, in the air, to outside off stump, Smith jams the bat down on it, looking to work it to leg
bludgeoned! He has a nice shimmy down the track, taking it from outside off stump and thumping it past mid-on for four
good length ball outside off stump, no real movement, and this time Smith gets across and defends neatly
good length just outside off stump, and he defends it into the covers
too straight from Rana, and a touch short, de Villiers comes on the frontfoot and flicks it away to mid-wicket for a single
good stuff, back of a length outside off stump with some purchase off the track, and it beats Smith as he goes up on the toes
beaten! Smith charges down and has a big swing at this one outside off stump, but there's nothing but air on that one

short of a length just outside off stump, stands up from nowhere, Smith ends up playing it well as it reared upto about chest height, ball rolls to the offside and de Villiers calls for the sharp single
back of a length, de Villiers looks to cut but fails to make contact
straighter on off stump, and its driven right to mid-on
back of a length on middle and leg, again there's no room, Smith shuffles and looks to work it past square leg but cant beat the fielder there
again he has a dance down the track and swings across the line to a straigher one on a good length, the bat comes down in an arc, beats him and they get a bye as Akmal fumbles it
good ball! Pitches on a length outside off stump and swings in, de Villiers stands and swings at it, and that ball missed the top of off stump by a bloody whisker
too full, to straight, movement helps it down leg and de Villiers flicks it backward of square for an easy couple
good length, a tad fullish you could say, but thats only to invite the booming drive from de Villiers, but he doesnt take the bait
back of a length outside off stump, he stands tall and defends to the off side with a firm 'NO' back to his captain at the other end
short of a length delivery on offstump, Smith gets on top of that one and defends it solidly
good length on off stump, Smith stands rooted and works the wrists on it, but cant beat the men on the leg side
fractionally overpitched, and Smith square-drives that firmly, in the air, through the gap between backward point for runs
back of a length delivery on middle and leg, Smith goes on the backfoot and turns it to square leg
short of a good length outside off stump, Smith goes back and punches that to mid-off, no chance of a run there
width on offer, but Smith ends up chopping the drive into the ground and cover takes it easily
full outside off stump, but he leaves it alone
short and wide, he goes for the cut and whats this....he tries to hit it too hard and falls down on this knees, lucky for him he didnt walk on his stumps!
good length outside off stump, he stands upright and defends back to the bowler
lovely seam movement, sir! Lands this in that sweet channel outside off stump and gets it to move away, ever so lightly, and suckers de Villiers into a tame poke at it
this one's fullish again, with little movement though, and de Villiers gets close to the pitch and leaves it be
back of a length, too straight, de Villiers shuffles across and drives it to short midwicket
back of a length outside off stump, Smith punches that off the backfoot in the gap on the offside and the scorching outfield carries it to the ropes
back of a length just outside off stump and this time he gets cheeky and tries to whip it around square, but the ball stands up and he ends up playing it back to Rana
now he charges down the track, collects it from outside off and hammers it on the up past Younis Khan at short cover and thats four more
drags one in short on the stumps and Smith coolly pulls that, rolling the wrists, through the gap at square leg for one out to the sweeper
back of a good length outside off stump, punched off the backfoot straight to cover
fuller and straighter, he flicks towards Yousuf at mid-on and they scamper one
beaten! Thats overpitched outside off stump and he goes onto bended knee and unleashes the booming cover drive...only problem is, he didnt make contact
straighter this time, he falls forward looking to flick past midwicket
back of a length outside off stump, left alone by de Villiers
fractionally short outside off stump, he cuts hard into the covers but Malik dives well and saves three with an athletic effort
oh ho! Beaten! Lands this gem on a terrific length on off stump and gets it to lift a tad, beating Smith's backfoot defence
errs in line, landing this on shortish length on leg stump, and pays for it as Smith eases it off his hips in the gap at square leg and collects four more to his name
good length outside off stump, played at with soft hands and a slighly open face and he picks up one down to third man
its short and wide, not good at all, and all Smith has to do is rock back and cut it past point for four to bring up the 50!
back of a length outside off stump, he plays it late, just dropping it in front of point and calling for the sharp single
good length on off stump, not short enough to pull but he goes through with some sort of loose shovel-shot, a scoop basically, and luckily for him its well over Yousuf at mid-on and he gets two
good length outside off stump, he leaves it alone this time
okay, where'd he pull that from! Fractionally short outside off stump and in a flash he slams that, on one leg and on the swivel, superbly over deep backward square leg for a flat six
full and wide, he drives that streakily in the gap behind square for one down to third man
good length, inviting the drive, but de Villiers shoulders arms
back of a length on off stump, he hops as he looks to turn it to midwicket, not timed well at all
good length again, asking him to have a drive, but he shoulders arms again as there was more lift on that ball
good length again, this time he comes to the pitch and drives down the ground, but cant beat mid-off
fuller this time on off stump, he comes forward and defends back to the impressive Asif
starts with a short one, which Smith pulls through square leg, out to the man on the ropes
dragged in shorter, he rocks back and pulls to midwicket, he was ball-watching and responded late to Smith's call for the run
fine leg was up, and he still bowls this full down the legs, de Villiers turns it but cant find the gap behind square, Yousuf fields well
straigher this time time, and he flicks around the corner but cant beat the man there
fractionally overpitched and he unleashes an exaggerated drive through backward point, and Asif moving sluggishly from third man mopes in, dives, and cant save four
back of a length, he rocks and back and cuts, and gets one in the air down to third man
on the money, fullish length just outside off stump, he comes well forward and defends back to Asif
overpitched, but just, and de Villiers drives that so very well through the covers for four
good length this time, straighter one, he comes half-forward and defends to Younis in the covers
straight, no movement, on off stump, he gets forward and defends as there's just no room to work with
and again he channels that tempting line on and around off stump and de Villiers has to come forward and defend to the covers
back of a length on off stump, de Villiers gets behind the line and defends back to the bowler
length-delivery, on the off stump line, going on with the angle, Smith pushes it back down the track
Signs of aggression. Smith charges out, backing away in the process, and slices a fullish delivery on the stumps to point
slap slog! On the stumps, Smith spanks it across the line, bat-face closes early and the ball goes to left of mid on
slightly short of length, outside off, de Villiers goes back and across, forces it through backward point
In the corridor outside off, de Villiers is sitting in the bed room, watches the ball sail past him
leans forward, punches a length-delivery to the off side
gets behind this one and defends to the off side
full, outside off, sliced away to deepish point.
on the middle, swatted to midwicket
Boom! de Villiers is running hot here. Slightly short, on the off and middle and he swung it over deep midwicket. Asif is stunned!
Caress! Super shot. classy straight drive. Just leans forward, offers the full face of the bat to a fullish delivery.
back of length, outside off, de Villiers dabs it to thirdman
almost a mix-up! forced to deepish point, both want a run, then both don;t want as the fielder makes a half-stop and then the decide what the heck,, lets run for the misfield and make it in time
bosh! Overpitched on legs, flicked over square leg, Asif runs across from deep backward square leg and slides but with his right feet in front and kicks it away.
Wham bham!  Thank you sir! Slightly short and Smith heaves it past square-leg
Thwack! Another pull! SA are really turning on the heat here. This one goes to the left of Asif
Bludgeon! The attack continues. Again short, on middle and leg, de Villiers pulls it in front of square.
slower one, outside off, de Villiers shapes to cut, is beaten by the change in pace and then by the extra bounce and the ball bobs over the blade to Akmal
who begins with a terrible wide way outside off stump, just couldnt control the slower one
its a no-ball, to which Smith advances down the track and smokes that powerfully straight back down the ground for four, and thats his 50
again he looks to get on top of Rana, and advances down the track to a shorter one, collecting it with one hand and finding the gap on the offside for another boundary
ho ho, make it three in a row, folks! Rana's misery continues as he tries the bouncer and gets no assistance from the pitch, Smith just pulls that well between midwicket and square leg for four more

carnage, simply carnage! Overpitched, marginally, and Smith's in such form that he just leans forward and drives it to the right  of Inzamam at mid-off, who just lazily turns around and knows all he has to do is collect it from the ropes
now he charges down and collects a fuller one, slamming it high down the ground, a bounce and over the ropes for four...thats 22 from from the over so far...Rana, Rana, Rana
and bowls a wide down the legs, poor, very poor
luckless is Rana! He bowls a full toss outside off stump, Smith comes down and slams the bat it, and the result is a thick edge down to third man for four...insane batting this from Smith
now he bowls a slower one, but again on the legs, and Smith comes forward and chips him wide of mid-on.... a DOT ball, would you believe?
hey, mate, I wanna have some fun too, says de Villiers, as he gets down on one knee and square-drives that between cover and point for four
overpitched again, and he creams that through the off side for four more...whats happening to Pakistan?
aye! Full and wide of leg stump, and even Akmal cant get to it, and the ball runs away for four to fine leg
good length ball on the stumps, he gets behind the line and drives back to Sami
full on the legs, and he clips that out to Afridi at deep midwicket
a low full toss outside off stump, which Smith works into the midwicket region for one
overpitched, but this time de Villiers drives that right to mid-off
tossed up on the stumps, Smith drives back to the bowler

stumped second ball, and the spinner does the damage! It was a brave move, as the PowerPlay was on, but Hafeez backs his instincts, firing a quicker, flatter one outside off stump and getting Smith to leave his crease, eyeing the big hit to the onside, and all Akmal has to do is whip off the bails
fired in outside off stump, Bosman defends it back to Hafeez
well, how long was he going to hang around? Hafeez fires on in outside off stump and Bosman gives him the charge, hammering it over mid-off for four

got em! Hafeez! This one's not got much on it, but it lands on a good length just outside off stump, and Bosman, perhaps looking for the turn, plays at it off the backfoot and gets the thinnest of edges into a gleeful Akmal's gloves
flatter and straighter, and Kallis turns that past midwicket for one to open his account
floated up on off stump, its the flipper, Kallis plonks the foot forward and defends with an inside edge to leg
looped up outside off stump, he uses the feet well and drives but cant beat cover
quicker and flatter, he cuts hard but cant beat the man at point
looped up again, almost squares him up as it spins in from middle and leg
flighted outside the off stump, Kallis stands tall and punches it to cover point
looped up, he comes well forward and works that from outside off stump to the onside, and Afridi has to field himself
tossed up on the stumps, whipped to midwicket
tossed up again, and he drives wide of mid-on
quicker and flatter on the stumps, he goes back and turns it to midwicket
tossed up outside off stump, driven to Inzamam in the covers
quicker through the air, he uses the feet well and drives it to mid-off
tossed up just outside off stump, Kallis drops the bat down on it and calls for a quick single, tip-and-run, as they call it
fired up outside off stump, Kallis drives to the off side
shorter this time, he cuts hard but cant beat point
tossed up outside off stump, he plants the front leg in the line of the ball and sweeps to square for one
too short and wide, spins away exaggeratedly and its called wide
lobbed up, and theres a cheeky little paddle-scoop in the air around the corner this time
width offered, he cuts but cant beat the packed off side field
back of a length middle and leg, de Villiers goes on the backfoot and whips it away to square leg
tossed up, he goes back and works that to midwicket
tossed up on middle and leg, de Villiers gets forward and drives it to long on
flatter outside off stump, Kallis plays away from his body and steers it to gully
HELLO?!? Tossed up, and he slog-sweeps that superbly over deep midwicket for half a dozen, top shot!
fired in quicker on the stumps, he defends to the off side
tossed up, he uses the feet to meet the ball and drives down the ground for the single
fired up outside off stump, he gets onto one knee and drives through point out to the sweeper, Asif
thats a wide outside off stump, plain as can be
flighted delivery outside off stump, Kallis makes room and turns it to square leg for a single
anothe wide outside off stump

gone! This one's looped up outside off stump, down onto bended knee goes de Villiers, looking to clout that into the deep midwicket stands, but he only finds the fielder stationed near the ropes, Rana, who jumps up and takes a neat catch
flighted on off stump spins away, Kallis drives it to extra cover
looped up on middle and leg, Prince defends back to Afridi
fired in quicker on middle and leg, he tries to flick but gets an outside edge to the off side
flat outside off stump, Kallis goes back and punches to midwicket
flat outside off again, this time he plays with soft hands in front of point for the single
tossed up, he drives down the ground for one
straighter delivery on the stumps, Kallis gets forward and defends it solidly
tossed up outside off stump, Kallis reaches for it and drives into the covers for an easy single
quicker down the legs and he sweeps for one, and there are too many easy singles on offer now
good ball on off stump, Prince defends back to Afridi
quicker through the air, on a good length, he drives an Afridi dives to his left and saves runs himself
the wrong 'un, looped up on the stumps and Prince drives back to him
tossed up outside off stump and Prince drives into the covers for one
looped up invitingly, he drives right to Inzamam at cover
fractionally shorter this time and Kallis crunches that into the off side for one
looped up on middle and leg, Prince plays it back to the bowler
tossed up on off stump, Prince sweeps around the corner for a couple
flatter this time, and he drives back down the ground to Hafeez
tossed up invitingly again, and Prince sweeps with the top-edge around the corner
fired in a tad quicker this time, and he drives uneasily to cover and still gets one
quicker through the air, Kallis looks to get runs through the off side but cant beat any one
shorter this time, he leans back and runs it off the face of the bat but cant beat backward point or gully
again he looks to run that fine but backward point is too quick
shorter in length, he drives and gets an edge through gully and they run hard
quicker on middle and leg, he doesnt use the feet well and drives to mid-on
he oversteps and Prince drives into the leg side for one
flat on off stump, Kallis goes on the backfoot and defends
looped up a fraction shorter, he rocks back and cuts right to backward point
quicker and it goes past him as he stands leaden-footed and flirst outside off stump
tossed up, Kallis gets to the pitch and drives to cover
flattish on middle and leg, Prince goes back and punches it to long-on
fired into middle and off, he drives down to long-on for one
tossed up outside off stump, driven back to Hafeez
flatter trajectory on off stump, Prince goes back and punches wide of mid-on for one
tossed up on leg stump and its flicked to midwicket
shorter on off stump and he cuts towards backward point for one
length delivery outside off stump, Kallis opens the face of the bat and steers that to gully
flatter down the legs and he turns it fine with little hassle
fired into middle and leg and Prince flicks with the use of the feet
short, flat and staying low but Kallis manages to get bat on the cut shot and collects one more
short and wide, Kallis rocks back and cuts it to the sweeper, Sami
flatter outside off stump, Prince goes back and punches to wide long-off
tossed up, Kallis gets to the pitch and drives into the covers for an easy one again
cheeky! Tossed up on off stump, Prince improvises with a nice little reverse-sweep that beats gully for four
fired in outside leg and this time he laps that fine for a couple
flatter and spinning in from outside leg stump, back goes Prince and turns it square for one to keep strike
short on top of off stump, Prince exposes the stumps and cuts into the covers for one
looped up on middle and leg, Kallis has to reach for it as he tries to turn it fine
quicker on the legs and he drives wide of mid-on for one more
the wrong 'un on leg stump, he turns it fine but cant find the gap
shorter and he rocks back to cut, but again cant beat the men there
this time he rocks back and does find the gap, much to Afridi's displeasure
quicker on off stump, Prince comes forward and defends
flatter outside leg and he works it past square leg for one
tossed up outside off stump, Kallis gets forward and drives into the covers for another easy single
almost! Fired into middle and  leg, Prince drives in the air back down the ground, Malik dives to his right but doesnt manage to hold onto it as the ball dipped in front of him
tossed up, Prince uses the feet and lofts that over Malik's head down to to long-off for one
quicker through the air and Kallis defends it
looped up on off stump, driven into the off side
quicker on middle and leg, he uses the feet well and drives to mid-on for one
flatter outside off stump and it stays very low as Kallis tries to cut, Akmal collects
fired into the legs and its worked fine for a couple
well flighted outside leg stump and Kallis sweeps out to deep fine leg for two more
looped up just outside off stump, Kallis comes forward and pushes it infront of point for the quick single
tossed up outside off stump, Kallis skips down the track and chips that inside out past mid-on
tossed up outside leg stump but Prince was already outside his crease and he drives that to mid-off for to bring up the 50 stand
full and flat on leg stump, clipped to square leg
fired in and again Kallis looks for the onside but ends up chopping into the ground
tossed up, he plays against the spin and drives to mid-off
flatter on the stumps, Kallis shuffles and works that to square leg
fired in outside off stump, Kallis gets across and works it around the corner

dropped! Can you believe it! Afridi's livid with Razzaq! This one was looped up on the stumps and Prince gets a step or two down, eyeing the onside, gets under it and ends up top-edging the attempted heave straight up into the air and Razzaq, moving in from long-on, drops a sitter
flighted outside off stump, Prince drives it to mid-off for one
quicker delivery on the stumps, Kallis defends it back to Afridi
flighted outside off stump, Kallis reaches for it and drives it to cover for a single
short and wide, Prince rocks back and cuts out to the sweeper
tossed up well outside leg stump as Prince makes room and advances, and ends up chipping it into the air on the leg side for one
tossed up, he plants the front leg down and heaves that down to wide long-on for a one-bounce four
quicker and flatter, Kallis goes back and drives to the on side for one
looped up invitingly but Prince cant put it away
fired in flat outside off stump, Prince has a big swing at it and misses all ends up
tossed up on off stump, he comes a step down and drives out to deep midwicket to keep strike
looped up on a length, but on leg, and Prince heaves that nicely over midwicket for four, top shot

this time he gets him! Again Afridi loops this one up invitingly and Prince cant resist, having another heave to leg but getting underneath it, the ball goes up in the air and Razzaq moves in from wide long-on to hold it with ease
flat and spinning away from off stump, Kallis shuffles and uses the wrists to pick up one to square leg
out the back of the hand, lands on a good length, Boucher goes back and punches to cover
looped up on leg and he laps it fine to get off the mark
tossed up on the stumps, Boucher smothers the spin with solid defence
fired down the leg side, Boucher shuffles across and flicks it away to fine leg for a single
fractionally short outside off stump, punched to cover point for a single
tossed up on the stumps, Boucher gets right behind and plays it back to the bowler
fuller this time on middle and leg, Boucher tries to flick but ends up with an inside-edge it to midwicket
flat outside off stump, Kallis steers that to gully
flat outside the off stump, Kallis opens the face of the bat and steers that to gully
tossed up, Boucher comes forward and whips it to midwicket for one
quicker on off stump, Kallis too comes forward and tries the flick but cant find the gap
flatter and shorter and he goes back and runs that wide of gully
starts to move down, Hafeez sees it and drops short, and Boucher ends up working it back towards the leg side
flatter this time as well and Kallis drives into the off side
fired in on middle and leg, Kallis flicks to Inzamam at short midwicket, who lazily and effortlessly pulls off a good save
short outside off stump, Kallis waits for it and late cuts it down to short third man
flat on off stump, Boucher comes forward and makes it full, then whips past midwicket for one
flat outside off stump, crunched off the back foot into the deep
tossed up outside off stump and its swept away to bring up the 250
dragged in short and he rocks back, going through with the pull, and Yousuf covers good ground in the deep to save four
flattish on off stump, Kallis plays with soft hands and finds the gap behind square for one
flighted on middle and leg, clipped to Younis at square leg who dives whole-heartedly and stops the single
tossed up, Boucher clears the front leg and heaves it away over mid-on for four
tossed up, sits up and Boucher gets the room to free the shoulders and smack this in the same spot for his second consecutive four
shorter in length, Boucher steps out and smacks it wide of mid-on for one
quicker outside off stump, Kallis angles the bat and places it in the gap for one more
fullish on middle and off, driven down to long-on for one, casual running between the wickets
good length outside off stump, and Boucher gets forward and clubs that firmly all along the ground past mid-off and even beats long-off
fuller and angled into middle and leg, he heaves at it and finds Younis at midwicket
now he hits a good length and forces Boucher to swing across the line, and the result is a regulation top-edge that flies over Akmal and runs away for four
fired in full into leg stump, Boucher chips it hard in the air to Younis at midwicket, who fails to latch onto a very difficult chance, was travelling very, very fast
slower one on the legs, clipped in the air over Younis this time
tossed up outside off stump, Kallis plays with soft hands to backward point and gives strike to Boucher
tossed up, very full, Boucher comes forward and gets under it, scooping it off the middle of the bat and picking up a flat six over deep backward square
now thats huge! Hafeez tosses this up on a good length, Boucher clears the left leg and slams that high and handsome over wide long-on for half a dozen more
SHOT! This one's wide of off stum and Boucher gives himself room to clear this over cover for four more!
flatter this time but he just comes a step down and clubs this all along the ground to the long-on ropes for four, my that ball was travelling at some speed
tossed up on middle and leg, Boucher comes on the frontfoot and turns it to short midwicket for a quick single
quick on a fuller length on off stump, hint of reverse swing there, and he manages to get the bat on it and squeeze one in front of point
back of a length and he tries the pull, but inside-edges to square leg
its a no-ball, which Boucher slogs straight down the ground, where Rana dives full-length and holds onto a great catch, but its not a legal delivery and Boucher gets to his 50, well played!
good length outside off stump, he gives it the kitchen sink and more and picks up a thick outside edge for four more
full outside off stump, Kallis goes for the booming drive but the ball stays low and he misses
overpitched and Kallis plants the front leg forward, creaming a drive out to the sweeper who dives and stops it on the ropes
in the blockhole, well bowled, Boucher looks to flick and gets an inside edge
whoof! Thats clubbed! It was there in the slot and Kallis just frees the arms, smoking that straight back down the ground for maximum
and he repeats the shot, but over long-on this time! Razzaq just bowled it too full and in the zone, and Kallis cashed in with a supreme display of slog-over hitting
poor, very poor, couldnt control the slower one and its wide down the legs
holy crap, he's being taken apart here! This one's back of a length on middle and leg, and its sent ome six or seven rows back behind backward square leg!
fuller on the stumps, driven out to long-on for a well-run brace
well, its a no-ball, for one, and a low full toss, which Boucher clips through square for four
jeez! This one's a high full toss going down leg, and he hammers this away throuh short fine leg for four more
in the zone, no room, and he manages to jam the bat down and its a DOT ball!
oh Lord! This is a thumping of the highest order! Asif serves up a high full toss which Boucher clouts high over wide long-on some ten rows back! Wow!
another low full toss but this yields just one as he chops it to mid-on
wait for me, says Kallis! This one's overpitched and he powerfully drives along the ground past the covers where Rana dives over it and gives up four
thats 100 in 5.5 overs! Asif serves up a no-ball, which Kallis drives into the covers for one
OH HO HO! Hammered! Another full delivery is simply heaved away with sheer disdain over wide long-on for six more!
dropped short, Kallis looks to pull but doesnt time it well, inside egde to square leg
short of a length delivery on middle and leg, Kallis goes on the backfoot and mistimes a pull shot to deep square leg
slower ball in the blockhole, Boucher chips to mid-on for one
short of a length, he slams it out to deep midwicket

gone! A slow off break outside off stump, Boucher reaches for it and can only slam it to Inzamam at cover, who holds onto a simple catch with those safe bear hands, but what an innings from this man! It all ended so tamely after the fireworks he displayed! 78 from 38 deliveries!
bad ball, too full down the leg and Kemp clips it to fine leg for four first ball, easy as they come
fuller on middle and leg, Kemp drops the bat on it and steals one in front of midwicket and square leg
overpitched, a cardinal sin here, and Kemp gets to the pitch and clubs it through the line, one bounce four to long-off
full toss on the legs, which he flicks out past square leg to the man covering ground on the ropes
good length outside off stump, Kallis gives himself room and hammers it over covers, where the fielder doesnt make any effort to get to, only a step forward and he could've caught that
rubbish ball down the legs for a shocking wide
back of a length on the stumps and its gets some lift, Kemp swings wildly and cant make contact
good slower ball in the blockhole, which Kemp digs out to the onside for one
short of a length and angling into the ribs, Kallis has a mighty heave at it and the ball thuds into his midriff, then ricochets wide of Akmal for four byes

and he gets a wicket! He serves up a slow legbreak out the back of the hand, cleverly done but way too late in the innings, Kemp was well into his shot before the ball came onto him, getting down to slog-sweep it away, but getting a top-edge which Akmal moves across to his right to snap up
fired in on a full length, Kallis drives out to wide long-on for one
too full on the legs and Pollock clips out to deep midwicket for one to get off the mark
a no-ball, oh man, even though its a well-directed yorker in the blockhole, and Kallis jams the ball down and gets the inside-edge to square leg
what was that? A no-ball, a wide...its all happening! Rana tries the slower one again, that looping legbreak, but he oversteps and the ball lobs up so wide outside off stump...he's lost the plot
slower one, too full, Pollock drives to mid-on
hello and goodbye! That was in the slot, and Kallis picked it smack from where it landed and hammered it high over extra cover for a big, big six!
its slow, its full, and its outside off stump, Kallis waits for it and has to reach for it, gets beaten, looks at the umpire, who doesnt call it wide and heads for the pavilion

inn2.comm: good line and length outside off stump, Hafeez leaves it alone
good length again outside off stump, this time he defends in front of point
beaten by one that pitched just outside off stump and did enough so shave past his forward defence
this one's short of a good length and Hafeez opens the face, punching it off the backfoot behind square to get the innings off
back of a length and some away swing this time, Hafeez stands and chases it, getting beaten by the movement
back of a length outside off stump, Hafeez punches to mid-off
begins with a full delivery on the legs, which Akmal punches past square leg for three
good length angled in from outside off stump, Hafeez punches back down the ground and at mid-off fields
jags in sharply from a length outside off stump and catches him hopping, but they pick up a run
much fuller now, aiming for the yorker, quick too and Akmal has work to do as he adjusts and plays it back to Ntini, who thinks about hurling it back at him
back of a length drifting into the pads, he stands erect and flicks well past square for three, good stuff from Akmal
short, wide, he cuts well but de Villiers at backward point flings himself to his left and intercepts it
slower one on a good length outside off stump, pitches and moves past his walk-in shot, well bowled, there's something in this track still
back of a length but too straight, and the batsman pushes gently into midwicket for an easy couple of runs
down the track he comes, connecting decently but importantly placing it in the gap at mid-on and collecting four
too short, and Hafeez picks up another four with a compact pull shot, fine leg was up and thats in the gap

slower on a short length, Hafeez gets up on the toes and waits for it, opening the face of the bat and angling it wide of the stumps down to Bosman at third man, who times his dive well and cuts it off on the ropes
too full, too straight, clipped backward of square for one out to deep fine leg
overpitched, something of a low full toss, which Hafeez puts away with ease through the covers, well played

edged and gone! Ntini perseveres with the fuller delivery and gets Hafeez stuck neither here not there, just getting half-cock forward with minimal foot movement and feeling for the ball outside off stump, and the result is an outside edge into Smith's lap at first slip
a good length outside off stump, Younis gets the feet moving early in his innings and times the drive well to mid-off
too straight and he eases into a crisp on-drive to mid-on and calls for the risky single, Akmal caught napping but all good in the end, Bosman fired in a good throw
straighter on a good length, Akmal goes back and defends and the inside edge gets him one to square leg
back of a length and angling in, Younis plays it with soft hands in front of point and Akmal's scurrying down the track but is sent back just in time as the throw comes in from de Villiers...nerves?
back of a length on middle and leg, Akmal hops and turns it to short midwicket
slower on a great channel outside off stump, and Akmal stands leaden-footed and fishes outside the stumps and misses
back of a length and quicker on middle and leg, Akmal falls over in his attempt to flick it fine and they dont get a run
short of a length, he chops it hard into the ground and de Villiers shuffles to his right and cuts it off
a tad fuller and pacier, Akmal drops the hands late on that one and steers it to de Villiers at backward point
hits a good length and Younis chases it with a wafty drive, and minimal footwork
overpitched, and thats a lovely caress of a cover drive through cover-point for four, good way to punish the bad balls
back of a length angled in, he gets behind the line and defends back to Ntini
back of a length outside off stump again, he plays it late and runs it to de Villiers at backward point, my he's a livewire at that position is AB
this one's moving in from a good length and Akmal drives on the up with zero footwork and gets beaten comprehensively, playing well inside the line
hits a good length and he unleashes a thumping cover drive which Prince at cover intercepts
back of a length and angled in, he's close to being squared up but adjusts late with a sliced bat and runs it in the gap at gully
what a catch! Pollock drops this one in short outside off stump, Akmal gets into position and pulls well, but Prince times his jump at square leg brilliantly and grabs it out of the air
back of a length on the stumps, he shuffles and taps it to Prince at square leg
fuller outside off stump and he has a swipe across the line, obviously eyeing the leg side, but doesnt make contact
short of a length on off stump, Afridi opts for a more textbook backfoot defence now
fuller in that nice channel outside off stump and he walks into that shot, again playing across the line and failing to connect
back of a length and moving down the legs, he plays it late and gets a thin edge that races past short fine leg for four, Afridi's off the mark
back of a length outside off stump, steered into the covers off the backfoot
shorter this time, he's cramped for room but goes through with the uppercut past gully and gets one down to third man
short of a good length outside off stump, theres that trademark smash off the frontfoot but there's a thick edge that flies down to Nel at third man on the bounce
back of a length outside off stump, Younis punches off the backfoot to mid-off and calls for the single
here he goes! His eyes light up as he spots a fuller delivery and he has an almight biff at that, using his feet, but he's nowhere near the pitch of it
straighter one angling down the legs and he adjusts late and nicely taps it in front of square leg for the single
back of a length outside off stump, he plays it with soft hands to the offside and three men converge, and 'WAIT' is the call back
HUGE! Down the track comes the big man, connecting well and slamming Pollock handsomely down into the stands behind long-on, super stroke from Afridi!
good length outside off stump, enough room for Afridi to clear the front leg, back away, and cream that over the covers for a one-bounce four

fuller, straighter and quicker, and Afridi walks across the stumps in an attempt to flick it over square leg, he's rapped just outside the line of impact and umpire Koertzen rules it was going high over the stumps
slower one, not spotted and he slams it in the air to mid-on, but the ball dies and Afridi escapes
fraction short and wide, Younis looks for the back-foot cut but mistimes it into the ground near his feet

no hundred here, as Afridi gets under a short-pitched delivery and slogs it high in the air, the steepling top-edge goes up and comes down near third man, where three men converge but its Andre Nel who holds his nerves and takes an excellent, well-judged diving catch to send Afridi back
back of a length outside off stump, he stands and drives into the covers for one
back of a length on the stumps, Yousuf drives to mid-on with ease
short of a length outside off stump, he's on the move, looking to steer it to backward point but cant beat the fielder
short of a length, steered down to third man for one
dragged in short, he picks the length superbly and hooks that into the crowd at deep fine leg for half a dozen, excellent shot, a treat to watch!
slower ball on a length on the stumps, he drives down the ground and bowler and mid-on swoop in
shot! Lands on a good length and he walks into a wristy cover drive on the up thats races away to the ropes, smack off the middle of the bat
slower delivery on a length outside off stump, again he looks to drive on the up but cant time it as well as that last gem

down the track he comes, looking to clear the infield, but the balls shorter than he expected and he slashes it via the outside edge down to Bosman at third man, who's late to react and the ball lands safely
slower ball on a good length outside off stump, Younis sees it and plays late into the covers
good length just outside off stump, he angles the bat and runs it down to third man to keep strike
reflex catch! Its full and moving in, and Younis stands and drives back in the air to Ntini, who dives to his left and holds a neat chance that was coming at him fast
short of a length, angling in from outside off stump, he stands and defends, ball hits the middle of the bat and trickles to the leg side, and he picks up one
beats him with one that's marginally fuller and shaping in, he just held the bat back a second
shorter one moving down leg stump, which he flicks off the hips, in the air, backward of square for one
back of a length again, Inzamam gets behind the line and waits for it, then gently turns the wrists for the single in front of square leg
back of a length outside off stump, Yousuf plays it back to Ntini to end a good over for the hosts
back of a length, he gets behind it and defends back to Nel
short and wide, he rocks back and cuts but de Villiers at backward point intercepts it
drifts onto middle and leg and Inzamam disdainfully punches that between midwicket and mid-on, wonderfully balanced, and gets four
back of a length on the stumps and he drives to mid-on this time
fuller on off stump, Inzamam's slow to come forward and drives with an inside-edge to midwicket
fuller length outside off stump, Inzamam knows where his off stick is and plants the foot forward, then leaves it be
back of a length outside off stump, comes in, but he's right behind it in defence
good length outside off stump, he stands and drives into the covers
straighter on a short length, he stands on the toes and rolls the wrists, sets off the for the single and just beats Bosman's throw from mid-on
full outside off stump, Inzamam eases forward and drives, Ntini collects in his follow-through
shorter this time, he gets in line and defends down the ground, wants the run and whew, he just made it in time as Bosman threw it in again
awesome! Fuller this time on the pads, and Yousuf effortlessly clips that way over deep midwicket for six, super, super stroke
fraction short and wide, he looks for that drive but chops into the ground for Nel to collect
back of a length, steered off the backfoot to de Villiers at backward point
good length, quick delivery which he initially goes hard at but adjusts and plays it to the off side
this one's short and sliding down leg side, and the big man swivels on one leg and pulls around the corner for four
good length outside off stump, he comes forward and drives to mid-off
fuller this time on the stumps, he lazily goes back and punches the on-drive through mid-on, and Pollock, initially giving chase, gives up as the ball speedsa way for four
to the first ball of the third PowerPlay, Yousuf stands up and hammers it nicely over mid-on for four, even though he wasnt in position to exactly play that shot
bigger, better! Kallis overpitches outside off stump, and Yousuf comes down and just slams that inside-out over extra cover for six
four more! This one's wide and he frees the arms, slamming it with a thick edge down to the third man boundary
back of a length on the stumps, and Yousuf gets behind the line and defends
shimmies down the track, eyes the spot he wants to hit it to, and slams it over the infield and the ball trickles over the wide long-on ropes for four
back of a length, he opens the face and runs it to third man for one
this time he comes down the track and carves this inside-out over the offside circle, getting it high, high and safely over Kemp running back from mid-off
back of a length on the stumps, defended towards point
bad ball, well wide of leg stump, he looks to pull but the balls too far away from him
cheeky shot, wonderful! Lands on a good length outside off stump, and he waits for it and opens the face of the bat, running it down to third man for four
back of a length outside off stump, opens the face again and steers it to backward  point

this time he's gone! Yousuf charges down the track, looking to smack it over the ring, but he doesnt get to the pitch and ends up hitting across the line with one hand and finding Smith standing just inside the circle
good length outside off stump, he plays it with his head down and keeps it out to the offside.
good length on the stumps, driven to mid-on

Inzamam perishes to the hook, oh boy! Kallis decides to tempt him with the short-pitched delivery, theres a man positioned out in the deep for this, yet still Inzamam obliges by pulling it down the throat of Andrew Hall, diving and pulling off a stunning catch at deep square leg
full delivery outside off stump, he's not interested in it and leaves it be
back of a length on the stumps, he hops and turns it to the leg side
good length just outside off stump, he stands and drops the hands on it
good length again, he comes forward and defends
back of a length outside off stump, he stands and defends
too much down the legs and he turns it past square for one
short of a length outside off stump, Malik punches off the backfoot to Prince at cover
back of a length, a tad slower too, and Malik runs it to point
fuller on this occasion, he comes on top of it and steers it to point again
short of a length, no room on offer, and he gets his head down and defends to the off side
fractionally overpitched and Razzaq gets onto the front foot, punching his cover drive superbly in the gap on the off side and getting four to his name
and then he has an ungainly swipe across the line to a good length delivery outside the off stump and failing to make contact
good length on the stumps, he gets behind the line and defends

as easy as they come! Kallis drops one in short and Razzaq just stands and wafts at it, the ball stands up a little more than he probably thought, and the ball just balloons up in the air for square leg to stand his ground and hold a dolly
welcomes him with a bouncer down the leg side, to which Rana ducks out of the way
edged and gone! This one's fuller and much straighter, Rana sort of comes forward and pokes at it with an angled bat, and Boucher takes the regulation edge
fuller delivery outside off stump, driven back to Nel who fields it well
straighter this time, Malik gets on top of it and flicks past Pollock at mid-on, but the  aging veteran does well to haul it in
fuller outside off stump, steered to de Villiers at point
short of a length outside off stump, Sami chases it and gets beaten
back of a length, he stands and cuts it into the covers where Prince fields
slower and fuller outside off stump, he shoulders arms
back of a length on the stumps, Malik gets in line and presents the full face of the bat back to Kallis
back of a length with a hint of reverse swing and Malik turns it to square leg
this one strays into him and he clips it past square leg for the single
back of a length moving in from outside off stump, Sami gets behind the line and defends off the back foot
again back of a length and he stands his ground, with good back-foot technique
fuller, slower and staying low outside off stump, which is enough for Sami to say hey, lets leave it alone, and he shoulders arms
full length delivery outside off stump, he comes onto the front foot and defends stoically to the off side
straighter this time, he comes forward again and drives back to Nel
angled in from well outside off stump, Malik covers his off stump allows it to pass through to Boucher
good length outside off stump, Malik comes forward and defends to the cover, bat and pad married in compact defence
slower on a fullish length outside off stump, inviting the drive, but Malik's not interested and hello....there's that cheeky grin from Nel
good length outside off stump again and he leaves it be to round off a maiden over
full delivery outside off stump, pushed wide of point for the single
thats a short-length ball angled down the pads thats called wide
short of a length on leg stump, Malik stands on the toes and takes it near the chest, rolling the wrists to convert it into one behind square
good shot, Sami comes forward to a fuller delivery and drives nicely in the gap in the off side and picks up four
short of a length, he stands up and gets a thick inside edge for one down to long leg
bangs in a bouncer down middle and leg stump that the umpire calls wide
fuller this time outside off stump and he comes onto the front foot and defends to cover
straighter one, Malik comes forward and defends back to the bowler
overpitched outside off stump, and he drives uppishly to backward point
much straighter this time and Sami gets bat and pad together in defence
shorter this time and he angles the bat to pick up one down to third man
overpitched, the slower one, definitely, which Malik drives at and gets an inside-edge past the stumps down to fine leg
much shorter this time, but he hops up and taps it to the off side
back of a length outside off stump, Malik goes back and defends to the off side again, and at the halfway mark Pakistan are 141 for 8
tossed up outside off stump, driven into the covers for one
flatter this time, driven straight to cover
strays to leg and its clipped to square leg
quicker and flatter outside off stump, steered towards backward point
flat down leg stump, easy pickings as he turns it past short fine leg for one
errs in line again, too short and wide and its cracked past point out to the sweeper
straighter one on a good length, and its defended back to the bowler
back of a length on off stump, Malik shuffles and works it to mid-on
shorter outside off stump, he leans back and runs that off the face of the bat down to Langeveldt at third man
fuller this time, angling well down leg, he defends and clips the pad, but too much on that ball to be given out
fuller length delivery, Sami comes on the frontfoot and plays it back to the bowler
fuller on the stumps, he plonks the front foot forward and defends
looped up outside off stump, Malik gets to the pitch and drives out to the sweeper
fired in quicker, Sami comes forward and drives to cover
quicker and flatter, Sami goes back and has to bring the bat down quickly as the ball skids on
tossed up outside off stump, he steers it to backward point
quicker on leg stump, turned to midwicket
fired in on off stump, he uses the feet and drives hard, but Peterson stretches to his right and collects it
short of a length outside off stump, steered right to de Villiers at backward point
fuller now, and he drives to the covers, "Yes, Polly, yes!" quips Boucher standing up to the stumps
good length on the stumps, he hurries to get bat and pad together...yawn...how much longer will this continue?
good length again and he gets forward and....defends
this one's straighter on middle and leg and he turns it to midwicket
shorter this time, he leans away from the stumps and plays it late, past Boucher's gloves, and the ball runs away for four
fired in quickly on off stump, he gets bat before pad and defends
tossed up outside off stump, defended
flatter on leg stump, worked to square leg
spins in sharply from outside off stump, and he cuts that from on top of off to backward point
quicker outside off stump, carved into the covers
fired in quicker outside off stump, he comes forward and drives into the covers
drifts down leg stump and he turns that in front of square leg
back of a length moving into him, he gets in line and defends back to Pollock
good length outside off stump, he comes forward and defends
back of a length on leg stump, flicked around the corner this time
fuller length delivery on middle and leg, Sami comes on the frontfoot and plays it back to the bowler
fuller on middle and  leg, slower one too, flicked to midwicket
tossed up outside off stump, he drives into the covers
now he wakes up, and dances down the track, slogging it down to long-on for four
looped up down the leg side, Malik goes on the backfoot and flicks it to deep mid wicket
flighted delivery on the off, Sami comes on the frontfoot and drives it to cover
fired up outside off stump, Sami comes to the pitch and drives into the covers for one
good length ball on the stumps, defended back
fuller length delivery on the stumps, Sami comes on the frontfoot and plays it back to the bowler
good length outside off stump, he hangs the bat out and gets beaten
fuller length delivery on the middle and leg, Sami shuffles across and turns it to short midwicket
wide of off stump, nudged away to third man for one
wide down the legs, Boucher does well to collect it
good length on the stumps, he goes back and defends to midwicket
tossed up outside off stump, he comes forward and defends...yawn...
fuller length delivery on the stumps, Sami comes on the frontfoot and plays it back to the bowler
fired in wide of leg stump and he sweeps around the corner, where Nel at fine leg dives and stops the boundary
flighted delivery on middle and leg, Sami comes on the frontfoot and defends it solidly
tossed up on the stumps, Sami comes on the frontfoot and drives it to mid on
fuller on the legs, he charges and thats clipped out to deep midwicket for runs
slower, good length delivery outside off stump, he gets cheeky and dabs the bat it and misses
back of a length, he defends into the covers
good length outside off stump, chopped out to third man for the single
he bounces him outside off stump and he nearly ducks into it
good length on the stumps, driven down the ground but the fielders converge
width offered and he chops it down to third man...this is painful stuff
overpitched outside off stump, and Sami thumps that through the covers for four to bring the 50-run stand
tossed up outside off stump, and this time he defends
tossed up outside leg stump, and he laps it around the corner
quicker this time outside off stump, he hurries to defend
dropped! Fired in quicker and he drives back in the air and Peterson puts the chance down to his left
tossed up again, and he defends
back of a length on the stumps, Malik defends
overpitched, fractionally, and he gets to the pitch to drive to the covers
good length on the stumps, defended to midwicket
slower ball on middle and leg, he comes forward and turns it to square leg
short and wide, he gets up on his toes and steers it to Nel at third man
back of length on off stump, he hops and works it to midwicket
tossed up outside off stump, he gets to the pitch and drives to Prince at cover
fraction shorter, he gets up and cuts to backward point
he wakes up! This one's tossed up on middle and leg, and its clubbed back down the ground for four
fired in quicker on leg stump, he makes room and drives it uppishly to mid-on, who's back for the catch
quicker again, and he drives to midwicket
fired in on off stump, he comes forward and defends with a leading edge to the off side
overpitched, he comes forward and drives to cover
full toss on leg stump, tucked away to square leg
full again, and he drives down the ground but the nonstriker's stumps get in the way and rob Malik of four
full on middle and leg, he drives to mid-on
overpitched and he drives hard to Kemp at mid-off, who dives and saves four
back of a length outside off stump, he stands and taps it to the covers
tossed up outside off, he drives into the covers
SHOT! Tossed up on off stump, down goes Sami, connecting very well with his slog sweep and sending it rows back over deep backward square leg
tossed up again, but this time there's a more orthodox drive into the covers
quicker and flatter, he makes room and cuts late past slip down to third man, Prince sprints across and saves runs
gone! Tossed up again, Sami plants the front leg forward and takes his eyes off the ball, slogging it up around the corner in an attempt to sweep, Boucher moves to his left and takes the catch
full on the stumps, he leans forward and works it into midwicket
fullish on leg stump, worked through square leg to bring up the 200
short of a length outside off stump, he stands erect and chops it to backward point
overpitched outside off stump, he leans forward and drives to point
fullish again, he leans into it and pushes to mid-off, "watch it, Graeme!" quips Boucher now
straighter and he defends to the leg side
fuller outside off stump, Asif steers it to backward point
tossed up outside off stump, he comes forward and defends
tossed up again, and yes,he defends again
tossed up outside off stump, Malik says stuff this, and uses the feet well to slam it over mid-on for half a dozen
flatter this time on leg stump, he swivels and clips that to square leg for one
flat again outside off stump, Asif comes forward and drives to cover
this one's shorter, Asif pulls through square leg but Malik doesnt want the single
good length on the stumps, he defends back to Kemp
he overpitches outside off stump, Malik clears the front leg, and heaves this down over long-on for six more, hurray for his aggression!
full again, he dances down and drives on the up, and just manages to clear mid-off
quicker on a good length, he stands and whips that to square leg
back of a length outside off stump, Asif stands tall and drives to point
back of a length and he steers that down to third man
good length, quick, and almost an inside-egde onto leg stump
overpitched outside off stump, Malik stretches forward and drives to cover
quicker on off stump, he comes forward and defends
tossed up again, he gets a good stride forward and defends
tossed up once more, and Malik comes forward and defends
tossed up, he comes down and swipes across the line, doesnt connect well and the balls rolls to square leg
flat on off stump, he goes back and punches back onto the nonstriker's stumps
flat again and he goes back and defends
tossed up, Maliks defends
shorter this time, and he carves that out to the deep cover ropes for four
tossed up on off stump, Malik walks into the shot and drives it to long-on and thats his 50 off 82 balls
tossed up, Asif comes forward and defends
tossed up again, he charges down and slams it high over midwicket and the ball lands safely between two fielders
flighted delivery on the stumps, Asif comes on the frontfoot and defends it
tossed up on the stumps, Asif comes on the frontfoot and pushes it on the off
gives it a bit of air on the stumps, Asif comes on the frontfoot and plays it back to Prince
flighted delivery on the stumps, Asif comes on the frontfoot and defends it solidly
looped up down the leg side, Asif goes on the backfoot and turns it to short midwicket
fired in from outside off stump, Asif rapped on the pads, but theres an inside edge
tossed up outside off stump, he defends to the off side
tossed it up on the off, Asif comes on the frontfoot and defends it solidly
all over, thankfully! Tossed up outside off stump, Asif slogs at it and gets a top-edge, Prince at slip back-peddles and takes the catch, and South Africa win by 164 runs!
